title: FAQ's
subtitle: Answers to a few common questions about renting the venue.

faqs.question: Can I bring my own food and cake?
Can I bring a DJ and loud music?
faqs.answer: Yes. Events with over 50 guests and alcohol require a police officer on site.

faqs.question: Do you offer tours?
faqs.answer: Yes, call or text to schedule a tour.

faqs.question: Do you provide d√©cor?
faqs.answer: We provide tables, chairs, and optional linen rentals. Decorations are up to you.
